com.magnet.android.mms.async.constraint

Class NetworkStateReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.magnet.android.mms.async.constraint.NetworkStateReceiver

  • public class NetworkStateReceiver
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    This broadcast receiver monitors any network state changes. If there is data connectivity, it will drain the queues for any pending asynchronous operations.

    In AndroidManifest.xml, specify the permission, receiver and AsyncIntentService: 

       <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COURSE_LOCATION"/>
   <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION"/>
   ...
   <application>
     <receiver android:name="com.magnet.android.mms.async.constraint.NetworkStateReceiver"
           android:enabled="false">
       <intent-filter>
         <action android:name="android.net.conn.CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE"/>
         <action android:name="com.magnet.android.action.NO_ASYNC_PENDING_REQUESTS"/>
       <intent-filter>
     <receiver>
  
     <service
       android:name="com.magnet.android.mms.async.AsyncIntentService"
       android:exported="false">
       <intent-filter>
         <action android:name="com.magnet.android.action.RUN_ASYNC" />
       </intent-filter>
     </service>
     ...
   <application>

      • enableReceiver

        public static void enableReceiver(android.content.Context context,
                  boolean enable)
        Enable or disable this receiver dynamically. This receiver should be enabled if there are outstanding queued requests depending on data connectivity constraint.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        enable - Set to true to enable this receiver dynamically; set to false otherwise.
